jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness

Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot

When Mia panically calls for Sasha in the water and turns Ben suddenly appears in front of her and shines a flashlight in her face
When Ben says “Are you kidding me” he is suddenly attacked by the shark at half the sentence. There is no build up here
When Sasha says “There is another way through” the shark suddenly appears without warning in the cone of light of the flashlight. This is accompanied by a very loud sound effect. ​
After Mia panically screams “Dad” and turns around with her flashlight in her hand, she discovers the body of the swimmer who was killed before. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Mia is suddenly grabbed by her father as she calls for the group
Directly as Grant says “I believe in you” he is suddenly attacked by the shark. This scene is similar to the heroic speech of Samuel L. Jackson in Deep Blue Sea and comes out of nowhere
After the Redlight comes on again, the shark’s teeth, accompanied by a loud bang, suddenly appear in front of the camera
As Alexa shines her lamp into the gap, the shark suddenly appears in front of her. But you can see it seconds before and there is no sound effect
Directly after Mia says “there must be another way” there is a change of cut and the shark suddenly swims towards her accompanied by a sound effect
As the group looks out the window at the sharks, Mia’s hand suddenly hits the window
After Mia has climbed on the lifeboat, Sasha is attacked by the shark as she climbs up the ladder
Mia is attacked by the shark as she swims to the group

As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side
